title: France panorama. [No. 68/36]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Technology - at Blagnac airport, near Toulouse, where the plants of the national Sud-Aviation company are located, the new Supersonic Anglo-French jetliner Concorde took its first official steps. 2. French youth and adventure - some people find their adventure underground. 3. The “Les Glenans” nautical centre in Britanny celebrates its 20th anniversary. 4. Paris in the year 2000. 5. Masterpieces of 16th century French tapestry at the medieval castle of Culan.
